Entries.default: "Halt. Keep both hands afore you and back away. Slowly."
"Come away. I won't be warning you again."
"You deaf, mate? No? We'll, you're about to be. Three warning's too many."
[Back away with your hands up.] "I'm going."
"Bloody oceans and Ondra's wet titties! You stark raving mad, drawing arms in a sea of pirates?!"
"So you says. To be safe, I'll just be seeing you from the area. This way now, and don't make no sudden moves."
"Captain Ben's informed me you're to have free rein of the fort."
